page.title: 10HOLIDAY PATTERNS IN RIPON
page.content:
We interviewed pupils at the school and asked how many people were going on holiday this year,where they were going and their accomodation. The sample was 561 people and the results were as follows :-
Table showing how many people went abroad for their holiday's. Holland 35,Spain 29,France 14,Germany 11,Italy 6,Greece 6,Portugal 3,Africa 3,Corfu 3,Canaries 3,Jersey 2, Gibraltar 2,Majorca 2,America 2, Tunisia 1,Yugoslavia 1,Australia 1. Total 122. Table showing most popular places for holidays in Britain Lake District 37,North of England 37, Scotland 31,Wales 29,Scarborough 23, Cornwall 19,Great Yarmouth 11,London 10,Norfolk 7, Blackpool 5,Filey 5, Bournemouth 4,Skegness 3,Dorset 2,
